descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

to.name: to
to.description: The destination stream, or a comma-separated list containing the usernames (emails) of the recipients. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
to.ai_hint: The destination stream, or a comma-separated list containing the usernames (emails) of the recipients. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

stream.name: stream
stream.description: The destination stream, or a comma-separated list containing the usernames (emails) of the recipients. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
stream.ai_hint: The destination stream, or a comma-separated list containing the usernames (emails) of the recipients. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

topic.name: topic
topic.description: The topic of the message. Only required if type is stream, ignored otherwise. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
topic.ai_hint: The topic of the message. Only required if type is stream, ignored otherwise. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: propagateMode
options.description: Which message(s) should be edited: just the one indicated in message_id, messages in the same topic that had been sent after this one, or all of them

options.name: topic
options.description: The topic of the message. Only required for stream messages.

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

dataBinaryProperty.name: dataBinaryProperty
dataBinaryProperty.hint: The name of the output binary field to put the file in

additionalFieldsJson.name: additionalFieldsJson
additionalFieldsJson.description: JSON format parameters for stream creation
additionalFieldsJson.ai_hint: JSON format parameters for stream creation

subscriptions.name: subscriptions
subscriptions.description: A list of dictionaries containing the the key name and value specifying the name of the stream to subscribe. If the stream does not exist a new stream is created.
subscriptions.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: isAdmin
options.description: Whether the target user is an administrator

options.name: isGuest
options.description: Whether the target user is a guest

options.name: profileData
options.description: A dictionary containing the to be updated custom profile field data for the user

values.name: id
values.description: ID of custom profile data value

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

email.name: email
email.description: The email address of the new user
email.ai_hint: The email address of the new user

fullName.name: fullName
fullName.description: The full name of the new user
fullName.ai_hint: The full name of the new user

password.name: password
password.description: The password of the new user
password.ai_hint: The password of the new user

shortName.name: shortName
shortName.description: The short name of the new user. Not user-visible.
shortName.ai_hint: The short name of the new user. Not user-visible.

userId.name: userId
userId.description: The ID of user to deactivate
userId.ai_hint: The ID of user to deactivate

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendPrivate' THEN SHOW parameter 'to'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendPrivate' THEN SHOW parameter 'content'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendStream' THEN SHOW parameter 'stream'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendStream' THEN SHOW parameter 'topic'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendStream' THEN SHOW parameter 'content'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'updateFile' THEN SHOW parameter 'dataBinaryProperty'
IF resource == 'stream' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'stream' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonParameters'
IF resource == 'stream' AND operation == 'create' AND jsonParameters == True THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFieldsJson'
IF resource == 'stream' AND operation == 'create' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'subscriptions'
IF resource == 'stream' AND operation == 'create' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'stream' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'stream' AND operation == 'getSubscribed' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'stream' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'streamId'
IF resource == 'stream' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonParameters'
IF resource == 'stream' AND operation == 'update' AND jsonParameters == True THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFieldsJson'
IF resource == 'stream' AND operation == 'update' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'stream' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'streamId'
IF resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'fullName'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'password'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'shortName'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation IN ["get", "getAll"] THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'deactivate' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
